mdRecord.dcterms:medium: brick (clay product); wood (plant material); half-timber construction [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Designed at the direction of German Emperor Wilhelm II for his oldest son, Crown Prince Wilhelm (William) and his wife, Duchess Cecilie of Mecklenburg-Schwerin. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cecilienhof [work]

The palace's appearance was attuned to its scenic surroundings through the use of traditional materials like brick and wood. In order to disguise the actual size of the palace, with its 176 rooms, individual building elements were cleverly grouped around several courtyards. -- http://www.spsg.de/index.php?id=126 [work]
